sentences.en: Blessed are forgetful for they get the better even of their blunders.
sentences.cn: 有福之人便是那些健忘者.因为他们同时忘了愚昧.

sentences.en: Do you think these wedding jitters are making you a little forgetful, sweetheart?
sentences.cn: 这些神经过敏的家伙是不是让你有些健忘了宝贝?

sentences.en: Forgetful of everything else he leaped from the bath.
sentences.cn: 他从澡盆里跳了出来,把其它事都忘掉了.

sentences.en: Grandfather is forgetful and often repeats himself when he tells a story.
sentences.cn: 祖父很健忘,他讲故事时常重复.

sentences.en: He is quite forgetful, and called an addle head by others.
sentences.cn: 他整天忘这忘那, 大家都叫他糊涂虫.

sentences.en: He's forgetful , so I'll give his memory a prod.
sentences.cn: 他很健忘, 所以我要提醒他一下.

sentences.en: He'wakes'completely forgetful of what has taken place in the trance.
sentences.cn: 他 “ 醒来后 ” 完全忘记了在昏睡状态中发生的事情.

sentences.en: I am so forgetful I often leave my keys at home.
sentences.cn: 我这么健忘,老把钥匙忘在家里.

sentences.en: I became forgetful , concentrating too much upon trivial tasks.
sentences.cn: 我过分注重琐屑小事,忘性越来越大.

sentences.en: I thought: the elderly are forgetful, or dementia, ah!
sentences.cn: 我想: 老人是健忘还是痴呆啊!

sentences.en: Just skimming and scanning the Bible makes one forgetful of God's promises.
sentences.cn: 快刀斩乱麻式的读经,只会教人把神的应许忘得一乾二净.

sentences.en: Men is forgetful when it comes to birthdays and anniversaries.
sentences.cn: 对于生日、周年纪念这些事情,男人总是那么健忘.

sentences.en: My mother has become very forgetful and confused recently.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈近来变得非常健忘，糊里糊涂。

sentences.en: My mother has become very forgetful and confused.
sentences.cn: 我母亲已变得很健忘很糊涂了。

sentences.en: Pitcher thought to himself that Maxwell was getting more forgetful every day.
sentences.cn: 皮彻心里想马克斯韦尔变得越来越爱忘事了.

sentences.en: We become forgetful, so we lose things - you get the picture.
sentences.cn: 我们变得健忘, 所以我们丢东西 —— 你已经大致了解了这一状况.
